title: Perfect cannoli
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons margarine', '1 egg white', '175ml red wine', '1.5 litres oil for deep frying', '675g ricotta cheese', '60g icing sugar, sieved', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '130g plain chocolate chips, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons cut mixed peel']
